mapper.select: select user_id as userId,user_name as userName,phone as userPhone from tbl_user where user_type = 0 limit 1

select number_id as numberId, order_id as orderId, order_name as orderName, order_type as orderType,price as price,total_times as totalTimes,times as times,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime , parent_id AS parentId from tbl_order where user_name = #{userEntity.userName} and user_phone like concat('%',right(#{userEntity.userPhone} , 4)) and business_id = #{userEntity.businessId} and times != 0

select number_id as numberId, order_id as orderId, order_name as orderName, order_type as orderType,price as price,total_times as totalTimes,total_times - times as times,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime ,every_time AS everyTime , equipment_id as equipmentId , parent_id AS parentId from tbl_order where total_times > times and user_name = #{userEntity.userName} and user_phone like concat('%',right(#{userEntity.userPhone} , 4)) and business_id = #{userEntity.businessId}

select user_id,user_name,phone,teacher_type as teacherType , provincial_id as provincialId from tbl_user where phone = #{userEntity.userPhone} and password = #{userEntity.password} and user_type = #{userEntity.type}
select time_id from tbl_equipment where equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
select time_id as number,surplus_time as startTime from tbl_equipment where equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
select times from tbl_order where number_id = #{numberId}
select total_times from tbl_order where number_id = #{numberId}

select user_id as businessId, user_name as businessName from tbl_user where user_type = 1 and user_id in ( select DISTINCT business_id from tbl_order where user_name = #{userEntity.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_phone like concat('%',right(#{userEntity.userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 4)))
select user_id as businessId, user_name as businessName from tbl_user where user_type = 1 and `password` = #{password}

select open_id as openId,user_id as userId,user_name as userName,phone as userPhone from tbl_user where user_name = #{userEntity.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and phone like concat('%',right(#{userEntity.userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 4)) and user_type = 0 limit 1
select count(1) from tbl_user where phone = #{teacherId} and user_type = 2
